Calcium Trace Correction

calcium_correction.Rd

Performs background subtraction, normalization, and baseline correction on calcium imaging traces. This is the main correction function that consolidates both modern and legacy approaches.

Usage

calcium_correction(
  raw_df,
  method = c("modern", "legacy"),
  span = NULL,
  normalize = TRUE,
  verbose = TRUE
)

Arguments

raw_df

A data frame containing calcium traces with columns named Cell_* for cell traces and BG_* for background traces

method

Correction method: "modern" (default) or "legacy"

span

Smoothing span for baseline estimation (0.01-1.0). Default 0.45

normalize

Whether to normalize traces by their mean. Default TRUE

verbose

Whether to show progress messages. Default TRUE

Value

A data frame with corrected traces and a Time column

Examples

# Basic usage
raw <- generate_synthetic_data(3, 500)
#> Generating synthetic data: 3 cells, 500 time points
#>   Generating background traces...
#>   Generating cell traces...
#>     Applying spikes...
#> Synthetic data generation completed
corrected <- calcium_correction(raw)
#> Warning: Column Cell_1 has low signal-to-noise ratio: 0.68 (below 2)
#> Warning: Column Cell_2 has low signal-to-noise ratio: 0.81 (below 2)
#> Warning: Column Cell_3 has low signal-to-noise ratio: 0.62 (below 2)
#> Processing 6 traces using modern method...
#>   Performing background correction...
#>   Normalizing traces...
#>   Performing baseline correction...
#> Correction completed successfully

# Custom parameters
corrected <- calcium_correction(raw, span = 0.3, normalize = FALSE)
#> Warning: Column Cell_1 has low signal-to-noise ratio: 0.68 (below 2)
#> Warning: Column Cell_2 has low signal-to-noise ratio: 0.81 (below 2)
#> Warning: Column Cell_3 has low signal-to-noise ratio: 0.62 (below 2)
#> Processing 6 traces using modern method...
#>   Performing background correction...
#>   Performing baseline correction...
#> Correction completed successfully

# Legacy method
corrected <- calcium_correction(raw, method = "legacy")
#> Warning: Column Cell_1 has low signal-to-noise ratio: 0.68 (below 2)
#> Warning: Column Cell_2 has low signal-to-noise ratio: 0.81 (below 2)
#> Warning: Column Cell_3 has low signal-to-noise ratio: 0.62 (below 2)
#> Processing 6 traces using legacy method...
#>   Performing legacy background correction...
#>   Performing legacy normalization...
#>   Performing legacy baseline correction...
#> Correction completed successfully
